edu.unc.ils.mrc.hive.util
Class SimpleTextCrawler

java.lang.Object
  edu.unc.ils.mrc.hive.util.SimpleTextCrawler

public class SimpleTextCrawler
extends java.lang.Object

This simple web crawler creates a textual representation of a website with all HTML, javascript, and CSS removed. The crawler starts with an initial URL and traverses links up to a maximum specific number of "hops". The result is a text document that contains the contents of multiple web-pages in the order traversed.

getText

public java.lang.String getText(java.net.URL url,
                                int maxHops,
                                boolean diff)
                         throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException,
                                org.xml.sax.SAXException
Returns a text representation of the website at the specified URL by crawling all links up to the maximum number of "hops" from the initial URL.

Parameters:
url - Website to retrieve text for
maxHops - Maximum number of hops to crawl
diff - Only extract differences between base page and subsequent pages
Returns:
Throws:
org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
java.io.IOException
org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException
org.xml.sax.SAXException

getText

public java.lang.String getText(java.net.URL url,
                                java.lang.String baseURL,
                                int maxHops,
                                boolean diff)
                         throws org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException,
                                org.xml.sax.SAXException
Returns a text representation of the website at the specified URL by crawling all links up to the maximum number of "hops" from the initial URL limited by the base URL. All links must match the base URL to be traversed.

Parameters:
url - Website to retrieve text for
baseURL - Base URL used to filter links
maxHops - Maximum number of hops to crawl
Returns:
Throws:
org.apache.http.client.ClientProtocolException
java.io.IOException
org.apache.tika.exception.TikaException
org.xml.sax.SAXException
